defense.name: Defensive Shape
defense.description: Improve defensive organization, positioning, and compactness

drills.name: 1v1 Close Out
drills.setup: 15x15 yard grid. Attacker with ball, defender 10 yards away.
cues: Close down quickly - sprint first 2/3, controlled last 1/3
Force to weak side or touchline
Don't dive in - delay and contain

drills.name: Defensive Triangle
drills.setup: 20x20 yard grid. 3 attackers vs 2 defenders.

drills.name: Defensive Block Sliding
drills.setup: Half field. Defensive line practicing shifting.
cues: Step up together when ball goes back

drills.name: Recovery Runs
drills.setup: Full field. Transition from attack to defense.

drills.name: Clearance Under Pressure
drills.setup: Penalty area. Defenders clearing crosses.
cues: Attack the ball at highest point

small_sided_games.name: 4v4 No Turn in Defensive Half
small_sided_games.setup: 40x30 yard field split in half. Goal at each end.
rules: Attackers cannot turn in defensive half
Must pass forward immediately if receiving in own half
cues: Immediate pressure when ball in their half

small_sided_games.name: 6v6+1 Defending in Numbers
small_sided_games.setup: 50x40 yard field. +1 neutral player always with attacking team.
rules: Goal = 1 point, win ball and score within 10 seconds = 3 points
cues: Don't get pulled out of shape
Counter press when you win it

attack.name: Attacking Movement
attack.description: Improve attacking creativity, movement off the ball, and chance creation

drills.name: Passing Patterns with Movement
drills.setup: 20x20 yard grid. Cones marking starting positions.
cues: Quality of pass - right foot, right pace

drills.name: Third Man Runs
drills.setup: 25x15 yard channel. Progress ball to end.
cues: Third player makes run after first pass
Time the run with the pass
Give early eye contact for return pass

drills.name: Overlapping Runs
drills.setup: Wing area. Winger + fullback combinations.
cues: Give and go or dummy over

drills.name: Breaking Lines
drills.setup: Three zones. Must break through each line.

drills.name: 1-2 Combinations in Final Third
drills.setup: Edge of box. Create shooting opportunities.

small_sided_games.name: 5v5 End Zones
small_sided_games.setup: 50x30 field. 5-yard end zones at each end.
rules: Score by controlling ball in opponent's end zone

small_sided_games.name: 7v7 with Wide Goals
small_sided_games.setup: 60x45 field. Two small goals on each endline (wide apart).

control.name: Ball Control & First Touch
control.description: Improve technical skills, first touch, and possession under pressure

drills.name: First Touch in Tight Spaces
drills.setup: 10x10 yard grid. Passing under pressure.
cues: Soft touch with inside of foot

drills.name: Rondo 4v2
drills.setup: 12x12 yard grid. Keep away.

drills.name: Turning on the Half Turn
drills.setup: 15x15 yard grid. Receive and turn.

drills.name: Receiving with Pressure Behind
drills.setup: Receiver with defender behind. Passer 15 yards away.

drills.name: Aerial Control Drill
drills.setup: Partners 15 yards apart. Lofted passes.

small_sided_games.name: 6v6 Two-Touch Max
rules: Loss of possession if more than two touches

small_sided_games.name: Possession Game 5v5+2
rules: Keep possession as long as possible

pressing.name: High Pressing
pressing.description: Improve team pressing, counter-pressing, and winning the ball high

drills.name: Pressing Triggers
drills.setup: 30x20 yard grid. Possession with pressing cues.
cues: Press when: bad touch, back pass, slow play
Work as a unit - don't go alone

drills.name: Counter Press After Loss
drills.setup: 40x30 yard field. Transition game.

drills.name: High Press from Goal Kick
drills.setup: Full or 3/4 field. Practice pressing keeper.

drills.name: Pressing Lanes
drills.setup: 30x25 yard grid split into channels.

drills.name: Defensive Unit Pressing
drills.setup: Half field. Defending team practices stepping up.
cues: Win the ball or force back

small_sided_games.name: 5v5 Win Ball in 10 Seconds
rules: Defending team must win ball within 10 seconds
If they do, they get 2 points for scoring

small_sided_games.name: 7v7 Three Zone Pressing
rules: Extra point for winning ball in attacking third
Must press immediately in final third
cues: High intensity when in final third

warm_up_activities.name: Dynamic Stretching
warm_up_activities.description: Leg swings, walking lunges, high knees, butt kicks

warm_up_activities.name: Technical Warm-up
warm_up_activities.description: Passing in pairs, moving, different surfaces

cool_down_activities.name: Light Jogging
cool_down_activities.description: Slow jog around field to bring heart rate down

cool_down_activities.name: Static Stretching
cool_down_activities.description: Hamstrings, quads, calves, hip flexors, groin

defense: Patience is key - don't dive in
Defend as a team, not individuals
Force attackers where you want them to go
control: Head up - see your next option
pressing: Press as a unit, not alone
Win it in 5 seconds or drop off
